thread.title: Sabre welcomes Roshan Mendis to APAC operations
thread.title_full: Sabre welcomes Roshan Mendis to APAC operations

author: Southlake, July 1, 2014
title: Sabre welcomes Roshan Mendis to APAC operations
text:
Sabre welcomes Roshan Mendis to APAC operations Southlake, July 1, 2014 
SABRE today named Roshan Mendis as senior vice president for Sabre Travel Network, Asia-Pacific, following the completion of its acquisition of Abacus International. 

Mendis will be responsible for the overall Sabre Travel Network business in the Asia-Pacific region, including the newly acquired Abacus business, in his new position. 

He comes on board after 12 years with Travelocity.com, where he was most recently president of the Americas, until its sale in early 2015 to Expedia, and has also worked in Zuji and the Travelocity Partner Network. 

The native Sri Lankan will relocate from Texas to take up his new post, based out of Sabreâ€™s Asia-Pacific regional headquarters in Singapore.
